import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import {AuthContext} from "../../auth/AuthContext"; import {useContext} from "react"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router"; import {types} from "../../types/types"; export const Navbar = () => { const {user:{name}, dispatch} = useContext(AuthContext);//llamamos al context y extraemos el usuario d el const navigate = useNavigate(); //creamos el metodo para deslogeo, llamando a la accion de tipo logout const handleLogout = ( ) => { dispatch( { type: types.logout, }) navigate("/login"); } return (
Associations
Marvel DC Search
    {name}
) }
